Posted By: Zenzei (9/29/2012 5:09:07 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This guy is cool. He reminds me of Odyssey block creatures like [Wild Mongrel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wild Mongrel) and [Psychatog](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Psychatog), although having to discard a creature card makes him a lot more narrow.  
  
With 8 GB dual lands in Standard he could curve nicely into and set up a decent-sized T3 [Splinterfright](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Splinterfright), but he will also be a prime bounce candidate if those effects continue to see play after [Vapor Snag](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vapor Snag) rotates.  
  
Also could be fun to throw [Slitherhead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Slitherhead)s into the GY for extra +1/+1 counters.
posts.html:
This guy is cool. He reminds me of Odyssey block creatures like Wild Mongrel and Psychatog, although having to discard a creature card makes him a lot more narrow.

With 8 GB dual lands in Standard he could curve nicely into and set up a decent-sized T3 Splinterfright, but he will also be a prime bounce candidate if those effects continue to see play after Vapor Snag rotates.

Also could be fun to throw Slitherheads into the GY for extra +1/+1 counters.

Posted By: TheWrathofShane (10/5/2012 4:03:16 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This thing needs to die... But thats a very difficult thing to do. The 1 cost regenerate dodges red burn, direct kills spells, and the like. He is low CMC so its a non-issue if he gets [unsummon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=unsummon)ed. Unless you pull a [terminus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=terminus) or give him -1/-1 ( effectively, just [auger spree](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=auger spree), [golgari charm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=golgari charm), [mutilate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=mutilate)) he just sticks around, making your [gravecaller](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=gravecaller)s difficult to remove.  
  
Better yet, he is in the colors for abrupt decay, so not even [Oblivion Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oblivion Ring) and [Detention Sphere](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Detention Sphere) last long on him.  
  
Very strong and hard to work around without direct hosers like . 5/5
posts.html:
This thing needs to die... But thats a very difficult thing to do. The 1 cost regenerate dodges red burn, direct kills spells, and the like. He is low CMC so its a non-issue if he gets unsummoned. Unless you pull a terminus or give him -1/-1 ( effectively, just auger spree, golgari charm, mutilate) he just sticks around, making your gravecallers difficult to remove.

Better yet, he is in the colors for abrupt decay, so not even Oblivion Ring and Detention Sphere last long on him.

Very strong and hard to work around without direct hosers like . 5/5

posts.post_content: With all this investment in +1/+1 counters and such, your going to want to protect him from low-cost counters like [Unsummon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Unsummon) or [Oblivion Ring](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oblivion Ring). Try using [Ranger's Guile](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ranger's Guile), [Sheltering Word](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sheltering Word), or [Ring of Evos Isle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ring of Evos Isle).
posts.html:
